snippet: As Crimea prepares for a referendum on joining the Russian Federation, residents in Odessa and in other Russian-speaking areas throughout the south and the east of Ukraine find themselves swaying, to greater and lesser degrees, between east and west.
abstract: Residents of Odessa and other Russian-speaking areas of Ukraine, as Crimea prepares for a referendum on joining the Russian Federation, find themselves vacillating, to greater or lesser degrees, between alternatives of Russian or Western allegiance.
lead_paragraph: As Crimea prepares for a referendum on joining the Russian Federation, residents in Odessa and in other Russian-speaking areas throughout the south and the east of Ukraine find themselves swaying, to greater and lesser degrees, between east and west.

headline.main: Fears of Impending Change Darken Normally Lighthearted Odessa
headline.print_headline: Fears of Impending Change Darken Normally Lighthearted Odessa
